ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD wishes Batman Begins would just end, while dragging out its Star Wars stupidity longer than the lightsaber fights in the movie! MAD also exposes parental idiocy and summer camp misery. Plus, the MAD Strip Club is introduced, and Monroe celebrates its 100th Episode!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:07:11. [Issue ID 129289]
